Title: Drawhub
SubTitle: Draw, together.
BulletPoints: DrawHub is the easiest and fastest way to get your ideas onto a digital canvas
Work alone, or with others in realtime, to create and share digital masterpieces straight to the cloud.

Title: U-Impactify
SubTitle: An E-Learning website for the social-purpose-sector
BulletPoints: Users can use this platform to develop their company's capacity, teach, and engage in various courses
Full-Stack Development using Agile Methodologies and Jira Board to track development progress
Worked in a team of seven over the span of four sprints, each two weeks long

Title: Splitify
SubTitle: Mobile Application for groups of friends to evenly split the cost of an expense
BulletPoints: Create, update, and edit profiles
Create and customize friend groups
Add transactions with members part of the group
Calculate how much each individual pays for each transaction

Title: Spotify API Clone
SubTitle: REST API that mimics Spotify using Microservices
BulletPoints: Create, Update, and Delete Profiles
Follow and Unfollow profiles
Like, and unlike songs to playlist
Querying songs by properties
Microservies used for future extensibility if required

Title: Mock Linux Shell
SubTitle: Java Application that mimics commands found in terminal
BulletPoints: Followed Agile Software Development Framework while working in groups of 3
Encompassed SOLID, Single Responsibily, and OOP principles
Create, save, and load File Systems

Title: Un-beatable Connect4 AI
SubTitle: Java Application with Graphical User Interface
BulletPoints: Play with friends or against our customly designed AI
Multiple AI difficulties (easy to very hard)
AI made by Alpha Beta Pruning and MinMax

Title: Portfolio Website
